name: WiseWords
0:
”Alexa, open Wise Words and ask for a quote”
”Alexa, open Wise Words”
skdetail:
This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: wise words
des: The skill collects quotes from a Wordpress-Plugin and when opened responds with one of thousands of them and their author. If you didn't understand you can read it in your Alexa-App.
priv: The developer reported that this skill does not collect personal information.
